--- named_schemas_drop_index.sql
DROP INDEX sch1.indexOnSingers
--- AST
&ast.DropIndex{
  Drop:     0,
  IfExists: false,
  Name:     &ast.FQN{
    Schema: &ast.Ident{
      NamePos: 11,
      NameEnd: 15,
      Name:    "sch1",
    },
    Name: &ast.Ident{
      NamePos: 16,
      NameEnd: 30,
      Name:    "indexOnSingers",
    },
  },
}

--- SQL
DROP INDEX sch1.indexOnSingers
